plant.question: I have roots, but no legs. I wear green, but have no clothes. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I need water to grow.
☀️ I like to be outside.
🍃 Birds can sometimes build nests in me

plant.question: I am a color and a plant, and monkeys like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I grow in bunches.
🐒 You peel me before eating.
🍌 I am curved in shape.

plant.question: I am red or green, and grow on a vine. I'm juicy and sweet, and sometimes made into juice or jelly. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 You can find me at a vineyard
🍷 Some adults turn me into wine.
☀️ I need sunshine to grow.

plant.question: I am a plant that looks like a tree, but I am small enough to keep in a pot inside your house. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I like to live indoors
🌴 Some of my type are from the tropics.
💧 You need to water me weekly.

plant.question: I have many petals, and come in many colors, but I'm often given as a gift to show love. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I'm often in bouquets.
🌹 Some of my type have thorns.
👃 You can smell me.

plant.question: I grow underground, and I'm orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
👀 Good for your eyesight.
🐰 Bugs Bunny enjoys me.

plant.question: I am tall and strong, and provide shelter for birds and shade for people. I can live for hundreds of years. What am I?

hints.text: 🦉 Owls make their home in me.
🪵 I can be made into furniture.
🍂 I lose my leaves in autumn.

plant.question: I am green and leafy and often used in salads. I come in many varieties, like romaine and iceberg. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I am a vegetable
🥬 Some people make wraps out of me
🐢 Tortoises love to munch on me

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on trees. Squirrels love to bury me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels hide me for the winter.
🌰 My shell is brown.
🔨 You need a tool to crack me open.

plant.question: I am a plant that can be made into paper. What am I?

hints.text: ✏️ We write on items made from me
📚 Books are made from me.
🌳 My trunk is often smooth and gray.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright and give the Earth its light. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
🌞 Plants need me to grow.
🌎 I am a star in the day.

cosmos.question: I am Earth's natural satellite and light up the night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I have phases, sometimes full, sometimes crescent.
🧀 Some people think I'm made of cheese!
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas that shines with a light of my own. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I'm born in a nebula
🌡️ I am extremely hot
🌌 The sun is one of me.

cosmos.question: I am a reddish planet, known for my rusty soil. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People are planning to visit me someday.
🌋 I have Olympus Mons, the largest volcano in the solar system.
👽 Some people wonder if life exists on me.

cosmos.question: I am the largest planet in our solar system and I have a giant red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 My spot is a giant storm.
🪐 I have many moons, including Ganymede.
💨 I am a gas giant.

cosmos.question: I have prominent rings made of ice and rock. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 You can see my rings through a telescope.
🌬️ I am another gas giant.
🪐 I am the sixth planet from the sun.

cosmos.question: I am a recognizable group of stars in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 Some of them look like animals or people from stories.
🧭 Sailors used me to navigate.
✨ The Big Dipper is one example.

cosmos.question: I am a massive collection of stars, gas, and dust, held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular.
💫 Our solar system is part of the Milky Way.
🔭 Scientists study me using powerful telescopes.

cosmos.question: I am a celestial body of ice and dust that develops a tail when near the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I'm like a dirty snowball.
☀️ My tail always points away from the Sun.
🔭 Halley is a famous one.

cosmos.question: I am a vast cloud of gas and dust where stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I am a stellar nursery.
🌈 I can be very colorful.
🌌 The Orion is a famous example.
